css: .ys{position:relative;background:#fff}.ys:before{content:'';display:block;width:100%;height:50%;background:rgba(50,179,255,1);position:absolute;left:0;top:0}.ys .menu-title h3 a{color:#fff;position:relative;z-index:2}.ys .online{background:url(../img/ys.png) no-repeat 0 center;padding-left:195px;position:absolute;right:15px;top:15px;color:#fff;font-size:16px}.ys .online p{font-size:23px;font-weight:700;line-height:1}.ys .online span{background:#fff;color:rgba(50,179,255,1);padding:2px 5px}.ys .swiper-slide{box-shadow:2px 2px 20px rgba(50,179,255,.3);border-radius:7px;overflow:hidden}.ys .swiper-slide .img{position:relative;padding-bottom:20px;background:#fff url(../img/yy.png) no-repeat center bottom}.ys .swiper-slide .img img{width:610px;height:325px}.ys .swiper-slide .info{background:#fff;padding:10px 20px}.ys .swiper-slide h4{font-size:24px;font-weight:400;line-height:2.5;margin-bottom:10px;border-bottom:1px solid #ccc}.ys .swiper-slide h4 span{float:right;font-weight:100;font-family:Arial}.ys .swiper-slide p{color:#999;font-size:20px}.ys .swiper-pagination{width:100%;position:relative;padding:20px 0 0 0}.ys .swiper-pagination .swiper-pagination-bullet{background:rgba(50,179,255,1)}
